subject: Politics
title: Deepfakes and AI Manipulation
description: A fast breakdown of Deepfakes and AI Manipulation for builders.

hook.text: AI can now create a video of a president saying anything. If seeing isn't believing, what evidence can we trust?

buildup.text: Deepfakes use AI to create realistic fake video and audio. They can fabricate events that never happened.

discovery.text: In 2023, AI-generated images of a fake Pentagon explosion briefly crashed financial markets.

twist.text: Deepfakes create a 'liar's dividend.' Real evidence can be dismissed as fake, letting guilty people deny the truth.

climax.text: Detection technology exists but lags behind creation tools. The gap is growing, not shrinking.

punchline.text: When anything can be faked, nothing can be trusted. That's the real danger.

quiz.question: What is the 'liar's dividend' from deepfakes?
options: Real evidence can be dismissed as fake, letting guilty people deny truth
Deepfakes always help honest people prove their case
Liar's dividend refers to profits from selling fake videos
